reviews.title: Back on the bus, Gus; stay on the train, Jane
reviews.text: In four months on the road, this is quite the worst hotel in 18,000kms, in a grimy, grubby ganster ridden city which is in the armpit of India. If you end up in Gorakhpur, arriving from Nepal too late to move on as we did, dont be deluded by the impressive facade and avoid the Park Regency in Civil Lines unless you relish;
